ChangeGroups.Name: Filter & Search Changes
Changes: Added a new author filter dropdown.
Added more actions to labels in the content lists.
Added a new "Any Issues" option for "Package Status" & "Compatibility Report" dropdowns.
All filter actions are now done using Ctrl+Click, added an option to swap this functionality.
Re-filtering using the shortcuts in the list now removes the item from your filter.

Separating terms with a comma in your search will split your search to match any of the terms (OR)
	• Adding '+' at the start of your term will require the term to be matched (AND)
	• Adding '-' at the start of your term will exclude items that match that term

Examples of the new search:
	• car, truck (matches 'car' OR 'truck')
	• building, apartment +european (matches 'european' AND ['building' OR 'apartment'])
	• condo, house -rico +american (matches 'american' AND ['condo' OR 'house'] AND NOT 'rico')

Added a Ctrl+[0-9] shortcut to switch between available tabs.
Swapped all double-buttons and option toggles' sides.
Animations are now disabled by default on macOS & Linux.
So many more UI improvements, changes, and fixes I lost count.
